attributes.action: Santa only brings stockings message to make Christmas fairer for all children.
attributes.additional_details: Government support would help spread a fair, inclusive message that Santa only brings stockings. This national campaign could reach schools, parents, and media, easing pressure on families and reducing feelings of inequality among children. It’s a positive, voluntary way to make Christmas fair for all.
attributes.background: Ask the Government to back a campaign promoting the idea that Santa only brings small stocking gifts, not main presents. This would make Christmas fairer, ease pressure on parents, and help all children share the same festive magic.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Petitions also need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
